body:
Hi Fawaz,
Here's a couple of Mac OS X applications that might be worth checking  
out:
Sofortbild for Nikon cameras:
http://www.sofortbildapp.com/		
and
HDRcapOSX for Canon DSLRs:
http://www.iesd.dmu.ac.uk/~jm/resources.html
Cheers,
-John
